resources.string: QuitSmokingNow
Quit Smoking Now
Welcome
Play button click
Next
Skip
Start
Hello blank fragment

This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of scientific papers from universities or online researches.\n \nFor you to have better results and the results that the app is giving, you must lower you consumption 50% and maintain it as long as you can.
Smoking cigarettes is expensive. Use our calculator to find out how much of your money is going up in smoke.

string.name: Intro_String
string.b: Welcome to Quit Smoking Now app. This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of specific scientific papers.

resources.string: Welcome\nThis is an bachelor\'s thesis app,\n created for University of Peloponnese

This app will help you lower your cigarette consumption, even quit smoking, with the help of scientific papers from universities, researches and researchers papers.\n \nFor you to have better results and the results that the app is giving, you must lower your consumption 50% and maintain it as long as you can.
About
How many cigarettes do you smoke per day?
How much do you pay per pack?
Here goes how much
The links for the papers, are below for you to see:
Did you smoke any cigarettes today?
Did you accidentally click more? Subtract one.
Subtraction
This is a channel description

This is a cravings timer.
 This timer will you resist tobacco for
 4 minutes
 when you have cravings.
Begin
Reset
EXAMPLE
Configure
Add widget
This is an app widget description
This is the Spending tab. There you can calculate the how much you spending per day, week and month.
This is the Cravings tab. if you feel the need to smoke a cigarette, please don\'t, use apps craving tab.
This is the Home tab. There you can click the cigarette when you smoke a cigarette.
This is the Result tab. There you can see your daily results depending your daily consumption from Home Tab.
This is the About tab. There you can see the links of the scientific papers with which the app is made.
Here you can see your results, depending on your daily cigarette consumption.\n\nPlease wait, be patient and the app will notify you to see the results.

Your today's consumption is higher than yesterday's. You must lower your consumption, not to increase it. Please, consult the papers from About tab about daily consumption and if you have cravings use the timer from Cravings tab. From here on, try to lower your cigarette consumption for your own health.\n Here are the consequences:

• Higher chances for lung cancer
\n• Higher chances damaging your Bronchus
\n• Higher chances for ischemic heart diseases
Description

Your today's consumption is less than yesterday's. This is one step of the many you will do to cut smoking. Please maintain lowering the consumption for you to achieve stopping smoking.\n Here you can see what are the consequences:

• Less chances for lung cancer
\n• Less chances damaging your Bronchus
\n• Less chances for ischemic heart diseases
Description

Your today's consumption is the same with yesterday's. Maintaining the same consumption doesn't mean that you will have less chances for health problems, you will have the same chances as yesterday, but these are still chances for something bad for your health in the future. From here on, please try lowering your cigarette consumption for your own health.

Congratulations. You didn't smoke any cigarette. This is a major step for you and your health. Maintain it and in a short period of time you won't have to smoke. If you have tobacco cravings, please use the timer from Cravings tab.\n Great job!

• Much less chances for lung cancer
\n• Much less chances damaging your Bronchus
\n• Much less chances for ischemic heart diseases
